long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Runner Santa Claus is a fun adventure game where we try to progress and get points by challenging obstacles with a Santa Claus.
There is a Santa Claus in the game. We can control this Santa Claus. With Santa Claus, which we can control, we move forward by overcoming challenging obstacles. We move forward by overcoming obstacles, reaching the finish line, and completing the levels. By completing the chapters, we unlock new chapters and continue the game. Runner Santa Claus 3 has emerged as an adventure game. Designed for us skill game lovers, as it is fun and challenging.

To swipe Install this extension to play the Santa Runner Game or offline with no additional downloads and no ads. 

You can contact us at support@724fun.com and share your thoughts and problems

After clicking the add the game to chrome button, you can find the game in the extensions section. If you wish, you can visit 724fun.com. If you wish, you can play again and if you want to remove it, you can remove it from the extensions section.
